channel.title: Shield of Arrav (Phoenix Gang)
channel.description:
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- --------------------Quest ID(13)Shield of Arrav(Phoenix Gang)------------------------ --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Quest Start for Phoenix Gang: Reldo
Npc IDS: ID: 20 Reldo- coords: 131,457 ID: 26 Baraek- coords 127,506 ID: 24 Man- coords: 111,3367 ID: 25 Jonny the beard- coords: 123,523 ID: 42 king- coords: 126,474 ID: 39 Curator- coords: 101,488 ID: 28 Tramp- coords 132, 527 ID: 37 weaponsmaster- coords: 105,1477 ID: 64 Thief- coords: 110,3375 (4 in phoenix gang building) ID: 27 Katrine- coords: 149,534
ITEM IDS: ID: 30 book ID: 10 coins ID: 48 key (phoenix gang key) ID: 49 scroll ID: 53 broken shield (blackarm gang half) ID: 54 broken shield (phoenix gang half) ID: 61 certificate ID: 146 fur
OBJECT IDS: ID: 67 bookcase - coords: 132,455 ID: 19 door- coords 110,3370 ID: 20 door - coords: 103,532
Missing objects Phoenix gang: ID 30 Stall- coords 129, 507 ID: 3 Table - coords: 112,3374 ID: 3 Table - coords: 111,3374 ID: 3 Table - coords: 108,3380 ID: Candles - coords: 109,3380 ID: Candles - coords: 112,3380 ID: landscape- coords: 110,3377 ID: Bed- coords: 111,3378 ID: Bed- coords: 102,3378 ID: Chest: coords: 101,3380 ID: 3 Table coords: 106,1480 ID: 3 Table coords: 107,1480
Missing Items in phoenix gang weapons room: ID: boots- 104,1476 ID: phoenix crossbow- 105,1476 ID: phoenix crossbow- 107,1476 ID: bronze dagger- 107,1477 ID: gloves- 107,1478
Reward: 600 coins and 1 quest point
Quest notes: (can only claim 1 certificate), player has to start quest and become a member of 1 gang in order to complete quest a player cannot simply just be given a certificate and complete quest...
Npc Quest Stages:
Reldo: 1)Reldo(Stage 0)-------------------------------------------------------------------------- http://pastebin.com/j135hFBZ 2)Retalking to Reldo------------------------------------------------------------------------ http://pastebin.com/vazDBN5z 3)Talking to Reldo after reading the book------------------------------------------------------ http://pastebin.com/K5hiR9uL
Search Bookcase: 1)Bookcase (before you start quest)------------------------------------------ SendMessage("A large collection of books"); 2)Bookcase Stage 1--------------------------------------------------------------------- http://pastebin.com/5hQznBHF 3)Bookcase after you complete quest----------------------------------------- SendMessage("A large collection of books");
Reading book---------------------------------------------------------------------------- http://pastebin.com/n25LuXM2
Baraek: 1)Stage 0 --- (if has item: fur)---------------------------------------------------------- http://pastebin.com/WvMhZTvn 2)Stage 0.5 --- (if has no fur)------------------------------------------------------------ http://pastebin.com/TU6GmgiQ 3)Stage 1 (after starting shield of arrav)--------------------------------------------------- http://pastebin.com/b3zvxTRA 4)Stage 2 (after completing quest)------------------------------------------------------- same as stage 0, and stage 0.5
Talking to Man: (in basement of phoenix gang) or attempting to enter phoenix gang door: 1)Talking to Man (Stage 0)------------------------------------------------------------------------------ http://pastebin.com/i7e68BNA 2)Talking to Man after finding out about phoenix gang (Stage 1)------------------------------ http://pastebin.com/UAZsZkFZ 3)Retalking to Man after offering your services to kill jonny the beard(Stage 2)--------------- http://pastebin.com/NJZN23Sf 4)Talking to Man after killing jonny the beard(Stage 3)--------------------------------------------- http://pastebin.com/qKWw5gVH 5)Talking to Man after becoming member of phoenix gang(Stage 4)----------------------------- http://pastebin.com/gbDmnXjh 6)if you loose phoenix key or drop it-------------------------------------------------------------------- http://pastebin.com/bL2uGsdx
Attempting to enter phoenix gang door BEFORE you kill jonny the beard------------ SendMessage("The door is securely locked");
killing johnny the beard------------------------ drops item (scroll)
Attempting to enter phoenix gang door after killing jonny the beard------------------ Sendmessage("You hear the doors being unbarred"); SendMessage("You go through the door");
Talking to Katrine in blackarm base after ur accepted into being a phoenix gang member---------- http://pastebin.com/PFXcgn8b
Searching chest (inside phoenix gang)------------------------------------------------------------------------------- http://pastebin.com/9yKzmvM2
Tramp: 1)Talking to Tramp after becoming phoenix gang member:------------------------------------------------------ http://pastebin.com/wmY2pcX5
king: 1)before you start quest------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ http://pastebin.com/qHY79Ghx 2)if u have both halves of shield--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- http://pastebin.com/CpSD6bVe 3)returning to king if you have certificates in inventory (can only claim 1 certificate)------------------------ http://pastebin.com/BnBHPFbY 4)Attempting to give certificate to king without starting quest------------------------------------------------------- http://pastebin.com/qHY79Ghx 5)after you complete quest--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- http://pastebin.com/qHY79Ghx
Curator: 1)before you start quest------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ http://pastebin.com/ux6viWnz 2)if you have both halves of shield in inventory-------------------------------------------------------------------- http://pastebin.com/b6dwTJqr 3)after you complete quest--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- http://pastebin.com/ux6viWnz

item.title: Shield of Arrav (Phoenix Gang)
item.dc:creator: @xrune xrune
item.description:
@xrune wrote:

--------------------Quest ID(13)Shield of Arrav(Phoenix Gang)------------------------

Quest Start for Phoenix Gang: Reldo

Npc IDS:
ID: 20 Reldo- coords: 131,457
ID: 26 Baraek- coords 127,506
ID: 24 Man- coords: 111,3367
ID: 25 Jonny the beard- coords: 123,523
ID: 42 king- coords: 126,474
ID: 39 Curator- coords: 101,488
ID: 28 Tramp- coords 132, 527
ID: 37 weaponsmaster- coords: 105,1477
ID: 64 Thief- coords: 110,3375 (4 in phoenix gang building)
ID: 27 Katrine- coords: 149,534

ITEM IDS:
ID: 30 book
ID: 10 coins
ID: 48 key (phoenix gang key)
ID: 49 scroll
ID: 53 broken shield (blackarm gang half)
ID: 54 broken shield (phoenix gang half)
ID: 61 certificate
ID: 146 fur

OBJECT IDS:
ID: 67 bookcase - coords: 132,455
ID: 19 door- coords 110,3370
ID: 20 door - coords: 103,532

Missing Items in phoenix gang weapons room:
ID: boots- 104,1476
ID: phoenix crossbow- 105,1476
ID: phoenix crossbow- 107,1476
ID: bronze dagger- 107,1477
ID: gloves- 107,1478

Reward: 600 coins and 1 quest point

Quest notes: (can only claim 1 certificate), player has to start quest and become a member of 1 gang in order to complete quest a player cannot simply just be given a certificate and complete quest…

Npc Quest Stages:

Reldo:
1)Reldo(Stage 0)-------------------------------------------------------------------------- http://pastebin.com/j135hFBZ
2)Retalking to Reldo------------------------------------------------------------------------ http://pastebin.com/vazDBN5z
3)Talking to Reldo after reading the book------------------------------------------------------ http://pastebin.com/K5hiR9uL

Search Bookcase:
1)Bookcase (before you start quest)------------------------------------------ SendMessage(“A large collection of books”);
2)Bookcase Stage 1--------------------------------------------------------------------- http://pastebin.com/5hQznBHF
3)Bookcase after you complete quest----------------------------------------- SendMessage(“A large collection of books”);

Reading book---------------------------------------------------------------------------- http://pastebin.com/n25LuXM2

1)Stage 0 — (if has item: fur)---------------------------------------------------------- http://pastebin.com/WvMhZTvn

2)Talking to Man after finding out about phoenix gang (Stage 1)------------------------------ http://pastebin.com/UAZsZkFZ
3)Retalking to Man after offering your services to kill jonny the beard(Stage 2)--------------- http://pastebin.com/NJZN23Sf
4)Talking to Man after killing jonny the beard(Stage 3)--------------------------------------------- http://pastebin.com/qKWw5gVH
5)Talking to Man after becoming member of phoenix gang(Stage 4)----------------------------- http://pastebin.com/gbDmnXjh
6)if you loose phoenix key or drop it-------------------------------------------------------------------- http://pastebin.com/bL2uGsdx

Attempting to enter phoenix gang door BEFORE you kill jonny the beard------------ SendMessage(“The door is securely locked”);

killing johnny the beard------------------------ drops item (scroll)

Attempting to enter phoenix gang door after killing jonny the beard------------------ Sendmessage(“You hear the doors being unbarred”);
SendMessage(“You go through the door”);

Talking to Katrine in blackarm base after ur accepted into being a phoenix gang member---------- http://pastebin.com/PFXcgn8b
